com.intel.icecp.core.security.trust

Interface TrustModelProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SecurityService<String>

    public interface TrustModelProvider
extends SecurityService<String>
    Interface for a trust model provider, which can be loaded via Java SPI, (as it extends SecurityService, and exposes a method to instantiate a TrustModel. This is something similar to what is done for ChannelProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S extends SecretKey,V extends Key>
      TrustModel<S,V>      		 build(KeyManager keyManager, Attributes attributes)
      Instantiates a TrustModel based on the given input attributes

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intel.icecp.core.security.SecurityService

        id

    • Method Detail

      • build

        <S extends SecretKey,V extends Key> TrustModel<S,V> build(KeyManager keyManager,
                                                          Attributes attributes)
                                                   throws TrustModelInstantiationError
        Instantiates a TrustModel based on the given input attributes
        Type Parameters:
        S - Signing key type
        V - Verification key type
        Parameters:
        keyManager - Key manager to use to fetch the necessary key material (either locally, or from channels)
        attributes - Attributes to use during trust model instantiation
        Returns:
        An instance of the requested trust model
        Throws:
        TrustModelInstantiationError - In case of errors while creating the trust model instance
